# declass

The goal of declass is to people explore the vast amount of archival data in Columbia University History Lab - Declassification Engine API. 

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
install.packages("declass")
library(declass)
declass_collection()
```
